A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: *** Spoilers *** Movie was designed to eliminate the heroes of the past so the franchise can move on. I waited for two movies and many years to see Luke be portrayed as a pathetic old Jedi with none of the powers of the original continuity stories. In those books he didn’t have to do a projection to survive such fire power as he did in the end. Could have just put Loki into that role and had the same experience. Luke’s death was a big disappointment and a waste. Oddly the one character that should have had a screen departure (Leia) was the only one that isn’t gone except for the droids.
